transcript:
Customer: Hello?

Executive: Hello?
Customer: Hello. Hello. Sir, good afternoon, sir. IndiaMART call [unintelligible] call [unintelligible] sir.
Customer: Ah, [unintelligible] [unintelligible].
Executive: Sir, [unintelligible] content [unintelligible] by list [unintelligible] mention [unintelligible] sir. By list [unintelligible].
Customer: [unintelligible] [unintelligible] [unintelligible] [unintelligible] [unintelligible]?
Executive: Dinesh.
Customer: Dinesh.
Executive: Yes, sir.
Customer: Okay. [unintelligible] [unintelligible] [unintelligible]?
Executive: [unintelligible] [unintelligible] [unintelligible].
Customer: Just a minute, sir. I will change your Malayalam person, sir. Just a minute.
Customer: No tension, sir. Speak up, speak in English. It's okay.
Executive: [unintelligible].
Customer: Okay.
Customer: So, can I help you?
Customer: This call is regarding what?
Customer: I think you people are trying to call me many days last in last week. I was unfortunately made to delay to attend call. Hello. And hello, yes.
Executive: Yes, sir, yes. This is Bharati, sir, from IndiaMART.
Customer: Ah.
Executive: Yeah, you are raising a concern also regarding IndiaMART service.
Customer: Yes.
Executive: So, what are things, sir?
Customer: The first concern about the staff because the people are keep on changing. I was spoke to the concern more than 10 people in last one month, I think. It is difficult to explain daily because last time Kiran, earlier there is Ashraf and it is difficult to explain this concern to many people and everybody is working behind this case.
Executive: Okay, okay.
Customer: What's your name? What is your name?
Executive: Bharati, sir, Bharati.
Customer: And what is your position?
Executive: Manager, sir.
Customer: Manager. Okay. Yeah.
Customer: So, our call was regarding we are getting very very less enquiry from the particular territory because our company is Kerala Kerala based company. We are getting very few enquiry on the content product. This is the only only issues we are facing.
Customer: And you you people are earlier earlier you are people are saying like that we have to keep on noting, keep on watching IndiaMART to increase the productivity. It's not our job. If it is there is any enquiry, we will call the people. But keep on watching, keep on tracing means this is your job actually.
Executive: Okay, okay, sir. I understand your concern. Actually, I do some changes in your catalog and I ask back in team to promote your catalog, okay? So after two or three days, you you may use daily basis, you get the relevant leads.
Customer: Do one thing. What are the documents you required? Just give me in the WhatsApp. Then if you need repeat again. If you need if you need any document from our hands, just send me in WhatsApp and accordingly I will send you because earlier okay, okay. I don't know how many people is coordinating in between us. We sent too many people, too many datas. Okay, okay.
Executive: Sorry for that, sir. Actually, here after your account manager will not be changed. No, I'm I'm I'm I'm even I'm damn sure you will not be there in the position in two weeks time. You will be changing. Then what is the use?
Customer: Yeah, yeah, actually I understand. We are we are we are we are renewing, we are renewing per year. Per year we speak to 100 people is not possible.
Executive: Okay, okay, okay, sir.
Customer: We are losing our money, then what is the use? Then we speak to someone we we speak to someone from Delhi at the higher authority. He was greater once. I been two two months back. It's not a easy job.
Executive: Okay, okay, I'll understand your concern actually. So I'll ask back in team to work your catalog and also No, listen, listen, listen. All those people everybody having understand the concern, but there is no results. Then what is the matter? Then what is the use? Yeah, sir, yeah, sir. Here after it won't be repeat again. So kindly gave me half an hour time. I'll do some changes in your catalog and get back to you.
Customer: Okay, first of all, you you just try to get the previous communication from any people. Then only we can communicate in better way. Yeah, yeah, yeah, sir. Yeah, I understand. Check the previous communication and and let us know what are the updates you made for us, then only we can speak.
Executive: Okay, sir. I'll take everything and I'll do some changes in your catalog. Please afterwards I'll get back you within 50 minutes. Okay, okay, sir. Okay, thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Staff keeps changing frequently.

- Getting very less inquiries from a particular territory.

- Asked to keep noting and watching IndiaMART.



Resolution:

- Executive will make changes in the catalog.

- Executive will ask the backend team to promote catalog.

- Executive will check previous communication.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will get back to the customer in 50 minutes.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- staff, inquiries, catalog, promotion
